summary.body: Hi, we would like to have our bathroom re-grouted. Would anyone have the contact details of someone who does this? Many thanks.
summary.subject: Bathroom re-grouting

summary.body: I am considering refurbishing my Lauderdale Tower bathroom as close as possible to the original. I wonder if anyone could recommend a good bathroom contractor who can cope with plumbing and tiling. I would not need a bathroom designer. Best wishes Ann George
summary.subject: Bathroom contractors - Lauderdale Tower

summary.body: Does anyone know a decent tiler? The last one never turned up when he said he would, he put the bathroom out of commission for two weeks, ripped me off, tiled over the old ones and now the new ones have started to fall off!!!!!!!!!!!!!! (I don't mind paying a bit extra for quality and reliability).
summary.subject: Bathroom tiles

summary.body: Hi, I have done a search for both, but there seems to be some discrepancy. Can I get some up to date recommendations for (a) Cleaners (once a week, couple of hours) and (b) Basic re-grout (on 2 original bathrooms). If anyone's got a minute. Much appreciated in advance.
summary.subject: Cleaner/Grouter
